tisCardPack:FullChargePower.NAME: Full Charge
DESCRIPTIONS: If all allies have Full Charge power at the end of the turn, all players deal 10 damage to all enemies.

tisCardPack:CryoPower.NAME: Cryo
DESCRIPTIONS: Frost orbs apply to all teammates.

tisCardPack:ReplicatePower.NAME: Replicate
DESCRIPTIONS: you play until the end of your turn will play for all allies as well.

tisCardPack:BloodPactPower.NAME: Blood Pact
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you lose HP, give 1 HP to all allies in the room.

tisCardPack:DoomedPower.NAME: Doomed
DESCRIPTIONS: Die at the end of combat. This power cannot be removed.

tisCardPack:SpiritBindPower.NAME: Spirit Bind
DESCRIPTIONS: dies, die. This power cannot be removed.

tisCardPack:GoldenFlamePower.NAME: Golden Flame
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal damage to this monster with a card, gain 1 gold.

tisCardPack:ShadePower.NAME: Shade
DESCRIPTIONS: This monster's current HP is hidden.

tisCardPack:DarknessPower.NAME: Darkness
DESCRIPTIONS: A veil of darkness surrounds you.

tisCardPack:SanctifyPower.NAME: Sanctify

tisCardPack:SacredGroundsPower.NAME: Sacred Grounds
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an ally gains Insanity, gain 1 Energy.

tisCardPack:StasisPower.NAME: Stasis
DESCRIPTIONS: Can't take damage or play cards this turn.

tisCardPack:ManiaPower.NAME: Mania
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take unblocked damage, gain 1 Strength and 1 Insanity.

tisCardPack:PurifiedPower.NAME: Purify
DESCRIPTIONS: All Dark orbs are converted to Purified Dark orbs.

tisCardPack:SelectDrawPower.NAME: Select Draw
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time an ally manually discards a card, draw 1 card.

tisCardPack:ClawedPower.NAME: Clawed
DESCRIPTIONS: Each ally played Claw counts towards your Claw damage as well.
